summary: This bill, the Bringing Benefits Back Act of 2025, aims to repeal portions of a previous act related to reconciliation, specifically Subtitle A of title I and Subtitle B of title VII of Public Law 119-21. This repeal would restore or revive any laws that were amended by those provisions as if the amendments never occurred. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives and referred to committees including Ways and Means, Energy and Commerce, and Agriculture.
